Not enough entropy, make it more complex: 熵不夠，請使其更為複雜
A Simple and Private LN P2P Exchange: 一個簡單且隱密的點對點閃電交易所

No orders found to sell BTC for {{curren: 未找到以 {{currencyCode}} 出售比特幣的訂單
By doing so, you will be fetching map ti: 這樣做的話，您將從第三方供應商擷取地圖磚。根據您的設置，私人信息可能會洩露到 RoboSats 聯盟之外的服務器。
. RoboSats developers will never contact: RoboSats 開發者絕不會聯繫您。開發者或協調者絕對不會詢問您的機器人領牌。
All of them as long as they are fast. Yo: 只要它們速度快，全都可以。您可以寫下您的首選付款方式。您必須與同樣接受該方法的對等方相匹配。兌換法幣的步驟會在爭議自動開啟的24小時之前到期。我們強烈建議使用即時法幣支付渠道。
At no point, AnonymousAlice01 and Baffli: 在任何時候，AnonymousAlice01 和 BafflingBob02 都不必將比特幣資金託付給對方。如果他們發生衝突，RoboSats 協調者會協助解決爭議。
Be aware your fiat payment provider migh: 請注意，您的法幣支付提供商可能會收取額外費用。無論如何，買方應承擔發送法幣的費用。這包括銀行費用、轉賬費用和外匯點差。賣方必須收到訂單詳情中所述的準確金額。
During a typical order, your trading pee: 在典型的訂單中，您的交易對象是唯一可能猜測您情況的人。請保持對話簡短和清晰。避免提供除了法幣付款必要以外的任何信息。
Each RoboSats coordinator will set a max: 每個 RoboSats 協調者將設置最大交易大小以最小化閃電路由失敗的麻煩。一天的交易數量沒有上限。每次一個機器人只能有一個訂單。不過，您可以通過機器人車庫同時使用多個機器人。記得備份您的機器人領牌！
In many countries using RoboSats is no d: 在許多國家/地區，使用 RoboSats 與使用 Ebay 或 Craiglist 沒有太大區別。法規可能會有所不同。遵守法律是您的責任。
Is RoboSats legal in my country?: RoboSats 在我的國家/地區是否合法？
It is a BTC/FIAT peer-to-peer exchange o: 這是一個通過閃電網絡運行的比特幣/法幣點對點交易所。
It simplifies matchmaking and minimizes: It simplifies matchmaking and minimizes the need of trust. RoboSats focuses in privacy and speed.
RoboSats is a decentralized exchange wit: RoboSats is a decentralized exchange with multiple, fully redundant, trade coordinators. The coordinator provides the infrastructure for your trade: mantains the intermediary lightning node, does book keeping, and relays your encrypted chat messages. The coordinator is also the judge in case your order enters a dispute. The coordinator is a trusted role, make sure you trust your coordinator by exploring its profile, webpage, social media and the comments from other users online.
RoboSats is an open source project: RoboSats is an open source project
The RoboSats client, which you run on yo: 您在本地機器或瀏覽器上運行的 RoboSats 客戶端不會收集或分享您的 IP 地址、位置、姓名或個人數據。 客戶端加密您的私人消息，只有您的交易伙伴才能解密。
The coordinator you choose will maintain: 您選擇的協調者將維護一個假名機器人和訂單的數據庫，以便應用程序正常運行。 您可以通過使用代理節點或 coinjoining 進一步增強您的隱私。
The seller faces the same charge-back ri: 賣方面臨與任何其他點對點服務相同的退款風險。 不建議使用 Paypal 或信用卡。
The trade fee is collected by the robosa: The trade fee is collected by the robosats coordinator as a compensation for their service. You can see the fees of each coordinator by checking out their profile. The trade fee is split to be covered by both: the order maker and the order taker. Typically, the maker fee will be significantly smaller than the taker fee. In case an onchain address is used to received the Sats a variable swap fee applies. The onchain payout fee can also be seen in the profile of the coordinator.
This is an experimental application, thi: 這是一個實驗性應用程序，可能會出錯。 小額交易！
This lightning application is provided a: This lightning application is provided as is. It is in active development: trade with the utmost caution. There is no private support. Support is only offered via public channels
What happens if my coordinator goes offl: 如果我的協調者永久下線會發生什麼情況？
You can also check the full guide in: You can also check the full guide in
You can build more trust on the RoboSats: You can build more trust on the RoboSats and coordinator infrastructure by inspecting the source code.
You can find a step-by-step description: You can find a step-by-step description of the trade pipeline in
Your sats will return to you. Any hold i: Your sats will return to you. Any hold invoice that is not settled would be automatically returned even if the coordinator goes down forever. This is true for both, locked bonds and trading escrows. However, there is a small window between the seller confirms FIAT RECEIVED and the moment the buyer receives the satoshis when the funds could be permanently lost if the coordinator disappears. This window is usually about 1 second long. Make sure to have enough inbound liquidity to avoid routing failures. If you have any problem, reach out trough the RoboSats public channels or directly to your trade coordinator using one of the contact methods listed on their profile.
Your trade partner will not know the des: Your trade partner will not know the destination of the Lightning payment. The permanence of the data collected by the coordinators depend on their privacy and data policies. If a dispute arises, a coordinator may request additional information. The specifics of this process can vary from coordinator to coordinator.
If you want to see it available, conside: If you want to see it available, consider submitting a request on our
Use this free input to add any payment m: 使用此自由輸入來添加您願意提供的任何付款方式。
Save credentials as a JSON file: 將憑據保存為 JSON 文件
Save messages as a JSON file: 將消息保存為 JSON 文件
The passphrase to decrypt your private k: 用來解密您的私鑰的密碼。 只有你自己知道！ 千萬不要分享。 也是您的機器人領牌。
Your PGP public key. Your peer uses it t: 你的 PGP 公鑰。您的對等方用它來加密只有您能閱讀的消息。
Your communication is end-to-end encrypt: 你的通信是以 OpenPGP 完成的端對端加密。您可以使用任何基於 OpenPGP 標準的工具來驗證此聊天的隱私性。
Your communication is end-to-end encrypted with secp256k1 schnorr signatures. You can verify the privacy of this chat using any nostr messages validation tool.
Your encrypted private key. You use it t: 你的加密的私鑰。您使用它來解密您的對等方為您加密的消息。您還可以使用它來簽署您發送的消息。
Your nostr private key. You use it to de: Your nostr private key. You use it to decrypt the messages that your peer encrypted for you. You also use it to sign the messages you send.
Your nostr public key. Your peer uses it: Your nostr public key. Your peer uses it to encrypt messages only you can read.
Your peer PGP public key. You use it to: 您的對等方的 PGP 公鑰。您使用它來加密只有您的對等方才能閱讀的消息，並驗證您的對等方簽署的傳入消息。
Your peer nostr public key. You use it t: Your peer nostr public key. You use it to encrypt messages only he can read and to verify your peer signed the incoming messages.
Your private key passphrase (keep secure: 您的私鑰密碼 (請安全存放！)
If the order is cancelled now but you al: If the order is cancelled now but you already tried to pay the invoice, you might loose your bond.

No active or pending orders: 沒有活躍或待處理的訂單

You will be taken to a conversation with: 您將被帶到與 RoboSats 電報機器人的對話中。只需開啟聊天並按開始。請注意，啟用電報通知可能會降低您的匿名程度。
Enabled RoboSats coordinators: 已啟用的 RoboSats 協調員

This order is not managed by a RoboSats: 此訂單不是由 RoboSats 協調者管理的。 請確保您對隱私和信任的權衡感到放心。 您將打開一個外部鏈接或應用
Coordinators of p2p trades are the sourc: p2p 交易的協調者是信任的來源，提供架構、定價，並在出現爭議時進行調解。 在鎖定您的保證金之前，請確保您研究並信任 "{{coordinator_name}}"。 惡意的 p2p 協調者可以找到從您那裡偷竊的方法。
Reloading. Invalid ratings will be filte: 重新加載。 無效評級將被篩選。
Verifying all ratings might take some ti: 驗證所有評級可能需要一些時間； 當正在進行加密認證時，此視窗可能會凍結幾秒鐘。
RoboSats client is served from your own: RoboSats客戶端已由您自己的節點提供服務，為您提供最強的安全性和隱私性。

Must be equal to or shorter than 240 cha: Must be equal to or shorter than 240 characters
Set the skin-in-the-game, increase for h: 設定風險共擔, 以提高安全保障
The amount is outside the allowed limits: 金額超出了允許的限額。
To protect your privacy, the exact locat: 為了保護您的隱私，您釘的確切位置將會被稍微隨機化。
You can add more details about your orde: You can add more details about your order.
You can optionally set a password so tha: You can optionally set a password so that only the robots you share it with can take this order.

The provider the lightning and communica: 提供者提供閃電與通信架構。 主機將負責提供支持和解決爭議。 交易費用由主機設定。 务必遵循信任主機的原則选择订单主机！
Enter amount of fiat to exchange for bit: 輸入以購買比特幣的法幣金額
If you receive a fiat transaction, it ca: 如果您收到一筆法定貨幣交易，則可以在交易完成後最多80天內單方面撤銷。
Robosats and their coordinators have no: Robosats and their coordinators have no control over the fiat system.
Scammers can exploit this vulnerability: Scammers can exploit this vulnerability in the fiat system to take away both your bitcoin and your fiat.
The pinned location is approximate. The: 釘定的位置是近似的。 聚會地點的確切位置必須在加密聊天中交換。
This order offers one or multiple paymen: 該訂單提供了一種或多種支付方式，而社區一直報告這些方式會撤銷其交易。
You cannot take an order yet! Wait {{tim: 您暫時還不能接受訂單！ 請等 {{timeMin}} 分 {{timeSec}} 秒
You send via Lightning {{amount}} Sats (: 您通過閃電網絡發送約 {{amount}} 聰
If the order is cancelled now you will l: 如果現在取消訂單，您將失去保證金。
The trade escrow has been posted. The or: 交易託管已發布。 只有當掛單方和接受者都同意取消時，才能取消訂單。
Make sure to EXPORT the chat log. The st: 請確保導出聊天記錄。 工作人員可能會要求您提供所導出的聊天記錄 JSON 以解決差異。 儲存紀錄是您的責任。
The RoboSats staff will examine the stat: The RoboSats staff will examine the statements and evidence provided. You need to build a complete case, as the staff cannot read the chat. It is best to provide a burner contact method with your statement. The satoshis in the trade escrow will be sent to the dispute winner, while the dispute loser will lose the bond.
If you have received the payment and do: 如果您已經收到付款但不點擊確認，您可能會丟失保證金。
Only confirm after {{amount}} {{currency: 只有在 {{amount}} {{currencyCode}} 到達您的賬戶後才進行確認。
Some fiat payment methods might reverse: 一些法定支付方式可能會在交易完成後的 80 天內撤銷交易。請保留此令牌和您的訂單資料，以備需要作為證明時使用。
The satoshis in the escrow will be relea: 保管中的聰將被釋放給買方：
Confirming will allow your peer to final: 確認將允許您的對等方完成交易。
If you have not yet sent it and you stil: 如果您尚未發送且仍然繼續進行錯誤確認，您可能會失去保證金。
READ. In case your payment to the seller: 注意：如果您對賣家的付款被攔截並且無法完成交易，您可以撤銷“已付款”確認。只有當您和賣家在聊天中已經同意進行合作取消時才能這樣做。在確認之後，"合作取消" 按鈕將再次可見。業務订单先者強烈建議不執行此操作！請確保您的支付失敗并且金額已退回到您的賬戶中。
Revert the confirmation of fiat sent?: 撤銷已支付的法幣確認？
Activate slow mode (use it when the conn: 啟用慢速模式（在連接緩慢時使用）
RoboSats coordinator will do a swap and: RoboSats coordinator will do a swap and send the Sats to your onchain address.
Say hi! Be helpful and concise. Let them: 打個招呼！請保持您的回答有用且簡潔。讓他們知道如何向您發送 {{amount}} {{currencyCode}}。
Wait for the seller to confirm he has re: 等待賣方確認已收到付款。
Attaching chat logs helps the dispute re: 附加聊天記錄有助於爭議解決過程並增加透明度。但可能會損害您的隱私。
Please, submit your statement. Be clear: Please, submit your statement. Be clear and specific about what happened and provide the necessary evidence. You MUST provide a contact method: burner email, SimpleX incognito link or telegram (make sure to create a searchable username) to follow up with the dispute solver (your trade host/coordinator). Disputes are solved at the discretion of real robots (aka humans), so be as helpful as possible to ensure a fair outcome.
The statement is too short. Make sure to: 陳述太短。 請確保詳細說明。
Unfortunately you have lost the dispute. If you think this is a mistake you can ask to re-open the case by contacting your coordinator. If you think your coordinator was unfair, please fill a claim via email to robosats@protonmail.com
Please, save the information needed to i: 請保存識別您的訂單和付款所需的信息：訂單 ID； 保證金或託管的支付雜湊（查看閃電錢包）； 聰的確切金額；和機器人暱稱。 如果您聯繫你的交易協調者，您將必須使用該信息標明自己的身份。
We are waiting for your trade counterpar: We are waiting for your trade counterpart statement. If you are hesitant about the state of the dispute or want to add more information, contact your order trade coordinator (the host) via one of their contact methods.
Both statements have been received, wait: 兩方声明已收到，等待工作人员解决争议。如果您对争议状态犹豫不定或想添加更多信息，请通过他们的联系方式中的一个联系您订单的交易协调者（即主机）。如果您没有提供联系方式，或不确定自己写得准确不准确，请立即联系协调者。
Please, save the information needed to i: 請保存識別您的訂單和付款所需的信息：訂單 ID； 保證金或託管的支付雜湊（查看閃電錢包）； 聰的確切金額；和機器人暱稱。 您將必須通過電子郵件（或其他聯繫方式）表明自己是參與這筆交易的用戶。
You can claim the dispute resolution amo: You can claim the dispute resolution amount (escrow and fidelity bond) from your profile rewards. If there is anything the staff can help with, do not hesitate to contact to robosats@protonmail.com (or via your provided burner contact method).
Just hang on for a moment. If the seller: 請稍等片刻。 如果賣方不存款，您將自動取回保證金。 此外，您將獲得補償（查看您個人資料中的獎勵）。
We are waiting for the seller to lock th: 我們正在等待賣方鎖定交易金額。
This is a hold invoice, it will freeze i: 這是一張保留發票，它會在您的錢包內凍結。 只有當您取消或案件失利的情況下才會被收取。
這是一張保留發票，它會在您的錢包內凍結。 當您確認收到 {{currencyCode}} 后，它會被釋放給買方。
Your public order has been paused. At th: 您的公開訂單已暫停。 目前其他機器人無法看到或接受您的訂單。 您隨時可以選擇取消暫停。
Before letting you send {{amountFiat}} {: 在讓您發送 {{amountFiat}} {{currencyCode}} 之前，我們想確認您能夠接收比特幣。
Just hang on for a moment. If the buyer: 請稍等片刻。 如果買方不配合，您將自動取回交易抵押和您的保證金。 此外，您將獲得補償（查看您個人資料中的獎勵）。
We are waiting for the buyer to post a l: 我們正在等待買方發佈閃電發票。 一旦他這樣做，您將能夠直接溝通付款詳情。
Among public {{currencyCode}} orders (hi: 在公開的 {{currencyCode}} 訂單中（越高排位越便宜）
If the order expires untaken, your bond: 如果訂單到期前未執行，您的保證金將退還給您（無需採取任何行動）。
RoboSats will try to pay your invoice 3: RoboSats 將嘗試支付您的發票3次，每次嘗試間隔1分鐘。 如果它繼續失敗，您將能夠提交新的發票。 檢查您是否有足夠的入站流動性。 請注意閃電節點必須在線才能接收付款。
Your invoice has expired or more than 3: 您的發票已過期或已進行超過3次付款嘗試。 提交一張新的發票。
Lightning payments are usually instantan: 閃電支付通常是即時的，但有時中途的節點可能會掉線，這可能會導致您的付款需要長達24小時才能到達您的錢包。
RoboSats is trying to pay your lightning: RoboSats 正在嘗試支付你的閃電發票。請注意，閃電節點必須在線才能接收付款。
RoboSats gets better with more liquidity: RoboSats 會隨著更多的流動性和更高的用戶数量而變得更好。把 RoboSats 推薦給您的比特幣朋友吧！
You need to enable nostr to rate your co: 您需要啟用 nostr 來評價您的協調者。
Please wait for the taker to lock a bond: 請等待吃單方鎖定保證金。如果吃單方沒有及時鎖定保證金，訂單將再次公開。
I bring my own robots, here they are. (D: 我自帶機器人，它們在這裡。（拖放 workspace.json）
My first time here. Generate a new Robot: 這是我第一次來這裡。生成機器人倉庫和擴展機器人領牌（xToken）。
unsafe_alert: 為了保護您的數據和隱私，請使用<1>Tor 瀏覽器</1>並訪問由聯盟託管的<3>Onion</3>站點。或者自托管<5>客戶端。</5>

Waiting for taker bond: 正在等待吃單方的保證金
Waiting for trade collateral and buyer i: 正在等待交易抵押和買方發票

Fiat sent - In chatroom: 法幣已發送 - 在聊天室中
Invoice expired. You did not confirm pub: 發票過期了。你沒有及時確認公佈訂單。請創建一張新訂單。
This order has been cancelled by the mak: 這張訂單已被掛單方取消
Invoice expired. You did not confirm tak: 發票過期了。你沒有及時確認吃單。
You must have a robot avatar to see the: 你必須有機器人頭像才能看到訂單詳情
